member.name: IShellView3.CreateViewWindow3
member.summary: Requests the creation of a new Shell view window. The view can be either the right pane of Windows Explorer or the client window of a folder window. This method replaces .
member.param: A pointer to an interface to provide namespace extension services.
A pointer to an interface that represents the previous view in the Windows Explorer or folder window.

param.name: dwViewFlags
param.para: Flags that specify details of the view being created.
In the case of an error, the view should fail silently rather than displaying a UI.
The view mode set by IShellView3.CreateViewWindow3 overrides the saved view state.
Folder flags set by IShellView3.CreateViewWindow3 override the saved view state.

member.param: A bitwise mask that specifies which folder options specified in dwFlags are to be used.
A bitwise value that contains the folder options, as , to use in the new view.
A bitwise value that contains the folder view mode options, as , to use in the new view.
A pointer to Shell view ID as a GUID.
A pointer to a RECT structure that provides the dimensions of the view window.
A value that receives a pointer to the handle of the new Shell view window.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
